breadCrumbs.text: Choose how to find a supplier

form.question: Select the most appropriate route to market (way to buy) for your project. You can shortlist the suppliers to find the ones most suitable for your project.

hint.text: If you select this option, you will need to invite suppliers to bid for your opportunity and assess all bids that are submitted.

If you select this option, you will need to confirm that this provides the best value for money or that there is only one supplier that can meet your requirement. You may want to get legal advice to confirm that this is a compliant route to market for your project.
Based on the supplier responses you receive, if you find a single supplier who can meet your needs you can choose to award your contract directly to them after completing a capability assessement.
